Sister Drusilla Lamson has had an experience in the things of God. She has been favored with great light, and has borne the test of affliction; and she should, in her position, be a light, a 
                                                                           8
blessing, to that institution. While she shall serve in her present position, she should do her utmost to direct the minds of the patients to God. In him there is comfort and hope for the suffering ones.
